word:
We are living amid the perils of the last days, and we must receive our strength from the same source as did Enoch. We must walk with God. A separation from the world is required of us. We cannot remain free from this pollution unless we follow the example of faithful Enoch and walk with God. But 


                 -6- 

how many are slaves to the lust of the flesh, and the lust of the eye, and the pride of life.
